summary: Client Sarah initiated a requirements meeting. No decisions were made: the PM asked for a project name and Architect, Developer, and QA did not provide comments.

actions.task: Propose and confirm a project name (follow up on PM's question)

risks.risk: Key roles (Architect, Developer, QA) did not provide input during the meeting, leaving requirements and naming unresolved.
risks.mitigation: Schedule a follow-up or assign owners to collect responses from each role; have the PM or client circulate the naming/options for review.
